This `palasso` vignette is in preparation.

```{r}
set.seed(1)
n <- 10
x <- list()
x[[1]] <- rep(1,times=n)
x[[2]] <- rep(0,times=n)
x[[3]] <- rep(0.5,times=n)
x[[4]] <- rep(stats::runif(1),times=n)
x[[5]] <- stats::runif(n)
graphics::par(mfrow=c(1,5),mar=c(3,1,1,1))
sapply(x,palasso::scales)
```
